name: Blinkcess
description:
Click/tap and drag to blink the Blinkcess across platforms. Avoid your pursuers and kill them with their own arrows in this fast pace arrow hell.

Touch screen recommended!

Game made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018

Programming: Asaf Nudler, Ori Brusilovsky

Art: Yael Maritz. Stav Goldshtein

Music and SFX: Zevik Perry
